SELECT INQUIRY_ID, USER_ID, INQUIRY_TYPE, CATEGORY, PROPERTY_ID, REALTOR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STATUS, ANSWER, CREATED_AT, ANSWERED_AT, USER_NAME, DELETE_YN, USER_PHONE, READ_YN, READ_AT FROM INQUIRY_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND INQUIRY_TYPE = 'REALTOR' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CASE WHEN READ_YN = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_TBL ( INQUIRY_ID, USER_ID, INQUIRY_TYPE, CATEGORY, PROPERTY_ID, REALTOR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STATUS, ANSWER, CREATED_AT, ANSWERED_AT, USER_NAME, DELETE_YN, USER_PHONE, READ_YN ) VALUES ( INQUIRY_ID.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{inquiryType}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{realtorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title}, #{content}, NVL(#{status}, 'PENDING'), #{answer, jdbcType=CLOB}, SYSDATE, #{answeredAt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{userName}, NVL(#{deleteYn}, 'N'), #{userPhone}, NVL(#{readYn}, 'N') )
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY_TBL SET ANSWER = #{answer}, STATUS = 'ANSWERED', ANSWERED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId}
mapper.select: SELECT I.*, P.PROPERTY_NAME FROM INQUIRY_TBL I LEFT JOIN PROPERTY_TBL P ON I.PROPERTY_ID = P.PROPERTY_NO WHERE I.REALTOR_ID = #{value} AND I.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND I.INQUIRY_TYPE = 'REALTOR' ORDER BY CASE WHEN I.STATUS = 'PENDING' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, I.CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRY_TBL WHERE REALTOR_ID = #{value} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND INQUIRY_TYPE = 'REALTOR'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRY_TBL WHERE REALTOR_ID = #{value} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND INQUIRY_TYPE = 'REALTOR' AND TRUNC(CREATED_AT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY_TBL SET READ_YN = 'Y', READ_AT = SYSDATE WHERE INQUIRY_ID = #{value} AND READ_YN = 'N'
UPDATE INQUIRY_TBL SET READ_YN = 'Y', READ_AT = SYSDATE WHERE INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId}
